original_title: Harry Enfield Presents Kevin's Guide to Being a Teenager
overview: Kevin the Teenager (Harry Enfield) presents this guide to those years of acne, angst and, of course, hating your parents, ably assisted by his best mate, Perry (Kathy Burke). All the basic topics are covered, including how to impress your sexy new teacher, and what you can do with your mum's vacuum cleaner.
tagline: Some shite where Kevin can't be arsed cleaning the car.
title: Harry Enfield Presents Kevin's Guide to Being a Teenager
